name: go-po-compiler-mcp
description: MCP server that compiles gettext .po to .mo and validates catalogs for WordPress.

tools.name: compile_po
tools.description: Compile gettext .po content into .mo binary compatible with WordPress.

return.description: Return compiled .mo as base64 or write to a temp path.

tools.name: validate_po
tools.description: Validate a .po catalog and report issues (headers, plurals, fuzzy, missing).

tools.name: summarize_po
tools.description: Summarize headers and translation progress of a .po catalog.
